plot: An episodic comedy sketch series full of 30-seconds-or-less micro-shorts dedicated to finding the funny in everything in the shortest amount of time.
plot_en: An episodic comedy sketch series full of 30-seconds-or-less micro-shorts dedicated to finding the funny in everything in the shortest amount of time.

title: Hurry Up and Wait
